attribute.name: title
attribute.value: Hourly Gridded MBARI Mooring M1 Sea Water Temperature and Salinity Observations

attribute.name: summary
attribute.value: These data have been processed from the original instrument netCDF files which have individual irregular time axes. The data in this file have been combined on a common hourly time axes and a common nominal depth axis. Data values outside of reasonable ranges have been flagged as bad.

attribute.name: keywords
attribute.value: CTD, Sea Water Temperature, Sea Water Salinity, Monterey Bay, OASIS, CIMT, MSE, MOOS

attribute.name: distribution_statement
attribute.value: Follows CLIVAR (Climate Varibility and Predictability) standards, cf. http://www.clivar.org/data/data_policy.php. Data available free of charge. User assumes all risk for use of data. User must display citation in any publication or product using data. User must contact PI prior to any commercial use of data.

attribute.name: citation
attribute.value: These data were collected and made freely available by the Monterey Bay Aquarium Research Institute.

attribute.name: comment
attribute.value: These data have been automatically produced by a real-time data processing system. Please understand all the metadata and use the data appropriately.

attribute.name: acknowledgment
attribute.value: These collection, processing, archiving and distribution of these data have been funded by the David and Lucile Packard Foundation.

attribute.name: processing_level
attribute.value: Real-Time provisional data following the OceanSITES conventions. Only automated range-checking quality control has been performed.

attribute.name: license
attribute.value: Follows CLIVAR (Climate Varibility and Predictability) standards, cf. http://www.clivar.org/data/data_policy.php. Data available free of charge. User assumes all risk for use of data. User must display citation in any publication or product using data. User must contact PI prior to any commercial use of data.

attribute.name: long_name
attribute.value: Quality flag for time axis, 1: Good data

attribute.name: long_name
attribute.value: Quality flag for Latitude and Longitude axes, 1: Good data

attribute.name: long_name
attribute.value: Quality flag for depth axis, 1: Good data

attribute.name: flag_meanings
attribute.value: No_QC_was_performed Good_data Probably_good_data Bad_data_that_are_potentially_correctable Bad_data Value_changed Not_used Nominal_value Interpolated_value Missing_value

attribute.name: flag_meanings
attribute.value: No_QC_was_performed Good_data Probably_good_data Bad_data_that_are_potentially_correctable Bad_data Value_changed Not_used Nominal_value Interpolated_value Missing_value
